name: THE HOPE
briefDescription: raise fund for the NGOs (in collaboration) ‘Astitv Foundation’ and ‘The Hope’ for different programmes conducted by the NGOsThis will help the NGO to carry out its programmes like *Divyang Angles, *Nishulk Pathshala, *Widow Support, *Women Empowerment   some objectives like to vanish social evils from the society like sexual harassment, global poverty to help the deprived section of the world that are not even able to fulfill their basic demands like education, food, shelter.The NGO support the widows by monthly grocery, medical treatments, and their child education
